itinerary.title: Relaxing Morning in Kensington Gardens
itinerary.description: Begin your day with a peaceful stroll through Kensington Gardens. Enjoy the spring blooms and the views of Kensington Palace from outside.

itinerary.title: Visit the Museum of London Docklands
itinerary.description: Explore London's maritime history with free entry. It’s an informative yet calming experience for a low budget.

itinerary.title: Affordable Lunch at Borough Market
itinerary.description: Sample delicious, budget-friendly street food from various vendors. Try seasonal dishes and fresh produce to enjoy a gastronomic spring lunch.

itinerary.title: Afternoon Walk along the South Bank
itinerary.description: Stroll along the Thames, enjoy street performances, and relax while taking in views of the Tower Bridge and the Shard.

itinerary.title: Relax in Southwark Park
itinerary.description: End your day with a tranquil walk through Southwark Park. Find a quiet spot to unwind and enjoy the fresh spring air.

itinerary.title: Walk through Central Park
itinerary.description: Stroll through Central Park's winter landscape. Enjoy iconic spots like Bow Bridge and The Mall. Dress warmly!

itinerary.title: Visit the Museum at the American Folk Art
itinerary.place: American Folk Art Museum, 2 Lincoln Square
itinerary.description: Explore unique folk art pieces. The museum has free admission on certain days; check their schedule beforehand.

itinerary.title: Lunch at a Budget Café
itinerary.description: Enjoy affordable Eastern European comfort food in this cozy spot.

itinerary.title: Afternoon at the Museum of the City of New York
itinerary.description: Discover exhibits about NYC’s history and culture. Affordable entry fees apply.

data.title: Morning at Sempione Park & Castello Sforzesco
data.place: Sempione Park & Castello Sforzesco, Milan, Italy
data.description: Begin your day at Sempione Park, a large green space perfect for a family picnic and play. Afterwards, explore the outdoor areas of Castello Sforzesco, which offers free entry and family-friendly courtyards.

data.title: Exploring Brera District & Shopping at the Quadrilatero della Moda
data.place: Brera District & Quadrilatero della Moda, Milan, Italy
data.description: Stroll through the charming Brera neighborhood with its boutique shops and street art. For budget shopping, visit the nearby affordable stores and markets in the Quadrilatero area, especially in the afternoon when prices are more accessible.

data.title: Lunch at Mercato di Via Fiori Chiari
data.place: Mercato di Via Fiori Chiari, Milan, Italy
data.description: Enjoy a casual and inexpensive lunch at this open-air market with various food stalls offering local treats and fresh produce perfect for a low-cost meal.

data.title: Afternoon at Museo Civico Archeologico & Shopping at La Rinascente
data.place: Museo Civico Archeologico & La Rinascente, Milan, Italy
data.description: Visit the museum (entry is affordable) to explore Milan’s ancient history. Afterwards, head to La Rinascente department store for window shopping and accessible fashion finds.

data.title: Evening at Giardini Pubblici Indro Montanelli
data.place: Giardini Pubblici Indro Montanelli, Milan, Italy
data.description: Relax at this family-friendly park with playgrounds and shaded areas. It’s a perfect spot for kids to unwind after a busy day and enjoy the summer evening atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Morning at Sempione Park and Sforza Castle
itinerary.description: Begin your day with a leisurely walk through Sempione Park, enjoying the winter scenery and open spaces. Visit the nearby Sforza Castle for its impressive architecture and museum exhibitions.

itinerary.title: Visit the Museum of Natural History
itinerary.place: Museo di Storia Naturale di Milano, Milan, Italy
itinerary.description: Explore fascinating exhibits on local flora and fauna, perfect for engaging children with nature themes even in winter.

itinerary.title: Lunch at Terrazza Duomo 21
itinerary.description: Enjoy a luxurious lunch with stunning views of Milan's skyline and cathedral, perfect for a high-budget family experience.

itinerary.title: Afternoon at Torre Branca and Parco Sempione
itinerary.place: Torre Branca, Parco Sempione, Milan, Italy
itinerary.description: Ascend Torre Branca for panoramic winter views of Milan, then stroll through Parco Sempione, stopping by the small pond and winter greenery.

itinerary.title: Evening at the KidZania Milano
itinerary.description: End your day with an interactive indoor experience where kids can enjoy role-playing activities in a temperature-controlled environment, ideal during winter evenings.

itinerary.title: Morning at Orto Botanico di Pisa
itinerary.place: Orto Botanico di Pisa, Pisa, Italy
itinerary.description: Begin your day with a peaceful stroll through Pisa's historic botanical garden, featuring autumn colors and a variety of plant species. Ideal for connecting with nature.

itinerary.title: Visit the Leaning Tower and Piazza dei Miracoli
itinerary.description: Take a leisurely walk around the iconic Leaning Tower, Cathedral, and Baptistery. Enjoy the architecture and autumn ambiance from the piazza.

itinerary.title: Lunch at La Taverna di Emma
itinerary.place: La Taverna di Emma, Pisa, Italy
itinerary.description: Savor delicious Tuscan cuisine with a cozy atmosphere. Opt for local seasonal ingredients to enjoy authentic flavors.

itinerary.title: Afternoon at Parco di San Rossore
itinerary.place: Parco di San Rossore, Pisa, Italy
itinerary.description: Relax with a walk in this expansive natural park, known for its woods, wildlife, and tranquil scenery perfect for autumn.

itinerary.title: Evening visit to Lungarno
itinerary.description: End your day with a gentle walk along the river, enjoying sunset views and the peaceful autumn landscape.
